title: Setting up an overseas post
creator_credit: Robert Kingsbury, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Explains the preliminary work involved in establishing an Australian diplomatic post abroad and the nature and value of a High Commissioner’s or Ambassador’s duties. A training film for cadet diplomats on the problems and procedures of establishing contact with a foreign nation.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Kingsbury, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
description: Explains the preliminary work involved in establishing an Australian diplomatic post abroad and the nature and value of a High Commissioner’s or Ambassador’s duties. A training film for cadet diplomats on the problems and procedures of establishing contact with a foreign nation.
